Name: Otaku Engine
About the game: Otaku Engine is not a game development engine. This is an 'experimental sandbox' that attempts to make casual image browsing more immersive and fun. ROBOT ASSISTANT Helps you on your creative journey. FRAME Make your images or videos pop out and give them that extra flair! EXPLORE Explore rooms made by other players (via workshop or internet URLs). EASY LEVEL EDITOR Quickly create and place art and architecture around you. EXPORT AND SHARE Showing off your creations is just one small file share away!
Meta Title: Otaku Engine: Dec 1, 2022, Jesus E Ruiz and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Otaku Engine? Check out the release date (Dec 1, 2022), developer insights from Jesus E Ruiz, and a complete game summary.
